title: Kakyron?
description: A fortified city, north of Licata, located on the western side of Sicily that was founded by the Sicani in the eighth century B.C.

properties.description: Representative location of an ancient settlement on Monte Saraceno in Sicily, dating from the seventh to fourth centuries B.C. Location derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of Monte Saraceno di Ravanusa, archaeological area
